      • compaction

        private void compaction(String tableName,
                        int flushes,
                        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.CompactionState expectedState,
                        boolean singleFamily)
                 throws IOException,
                        InterruptedException
        Load data to a table, flush it to disk, trigger compaction, confirm the compaction state is right and wait till it is done.
        参数:
        tableName -
        flushes -
        expectedState -
        singleFamily - otherwise, run compaction on all cfs
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
